name: Lost in my Mind Palette
description:
I'm sure there is a variant on the method of loci for artists - Instead of a means to enhance memory and recall by using visualizations of spatial environments, could there be a "mind palace" equivalent using colour? 

Having challenges in processing colour myself, I often get frustratingly lost in trying to differentiate between colours on the colour wheel, and even more so when trying to recall a colour that was previously used. Being a developing and aspiring digital artist, some of that challenge is removed for me, with the tools at my disposal, but maybe, just maybe, my colour challenges aren't challenges at all.

When creating this piece, I thought back to the colour of moments in my life, where I interacted with artistic works, in hopes to construct a "mind palette" of sorts, and re-visualize those experiences and recall those memory more vividly - a process by which I’m happy to get lost in.
